AI Description: libcap is a library used to manage Linux capabilities (fine-grained kernel permission controls) for programs that need to perform certain privileged operations without the need for full superuser privileges.
Core Features: Manages Linux Capabilities For Programs, Allows Programs To Perform Specific Privileged Operations Without Full Superuser Privileges, Enhances Security By Limiting Program Access To Only Necessary Capabilities
General Tags: Linux Capabilities Management, Security Enhancement, Privileged Operations
